articles.title: Countries Halt Funding To UN Agency Amid Claim Staff Helped In Hamas Attack - NDTV
articles.description: Six European countries paused funding for the U.N. refugee agency for Palestinians (UNRWA) on Saturday, following allegations that some of its staff were involved in the October 7 Hamas attacks on Israel.
articles.content:
Six European countries have paused funding for the UN refugee agency for Palestinians
London: Six European countries paused funding for the U.N. refugee agency for Palestinians (UNRWA) on Saturday, … [+3561 chars]
